metadata.title: CVE-2021-46225 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: A buffer overflow in the GmfOpenMesh() function of libMeshb v7.61 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted MESH file.

notes.note: sbeattie> freefem++ contains an embedded copy of libMeshb

criterions.comment: freefem++ package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
